google_reviews.author: Steven Eiselt
google_reviews.review: The apartments are older but well maintained (e.g. extensive roof maintenance was done during the summer of 2024). Liz, the onsite manager, routinely answers questions via text within 30 minutes and never failed to resolve any of my issues. The trees and foliage that line the walkways between the four apartment buildings are full of birds and squirrels which is always nice in the spring. The parking is plentiful, and the location is very nice for access to downtown and grocery shopping. The cost of rent is very affordable for the space of the apartments. Sad to leave but on to bigger and better things!

google_reviews.author: Rebecca Cohen
google_reviews.review: The apartments look nice on the inside, and onsite manager Liz is very kind and adaptable. Unfortunately Christy, the offsite manager, could majorly improve how she speaks to people in terms of unnecessary rudeness. I checked in to see how our rental app was coming and she proceeded to rightfully explain that she only makes reference calls once (sure, its frustrating when it means there was a miscommunication with someone and wont be revisited, but I understand from one busy woman to another) but then continue to state that our application is dead in the water. Hope Liz gets a raise though!
